entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
